fractal_intelligence.principle: Self-similar patterns at multiple scales enable efficient knowledge representation

recursive_optimization.principle: Iterative self-improvement through structured feedback loops

autonomous_intelligence.principle: Independent decision-making with minimal human oversight

swarm_systems.principle: Collective intelligence through distributed autonomous agents

convergent_themes: Self-similarity reduces complexity while maintaining expressiveness
Recursive improvement leads to exponential capability growth
Distributed intelligence provides robustness and scalability
Meta-learning enables adaptation to new domains
design_principles: Fractal architecture with recursive self-similar modules
Hierarchical processing with different temporal scales
